akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1750f. Rules and regulations The Secretary is authorized and directed to make such rules and regulations as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this subchapter. (June 27, 1934, ch. 847, title IX, § 907, as added Sept. 1, 1951, ch. 378, title II, § 201, 65 Stat. 301; amended Pub. L. 90–19, § 1(a)(3), May 25, 1967, 81 Stat. 17.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1967—Pub. L. 90–19 substituted “Secretary” for “Commissioner”.
